name: Budd
description:
Budd is a simple platformer game I made for a university assignment about a cube boy with lanky arms and legs escaping a lab facility because he fell in love with a poster of a field he saw. I decided to make a game where you use different speed states to get through a level, achieved by altering some of the code that was supplied to us.

This was  a recreation of a previous game I made when I was 14, where I focused on expanding on the puzzel aspects.
